original_text: because of his sins that he committed, doing evil in the sight of the Lord, walking in the way of Jeroboam, and for his sin which he committed, making Israel to sin.
korean_text: 이는 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 범죄하였기 때문이니라 그가 여로보암의 길로 행하며 그가 이스라엘에게 죄를 범하게 한 그 죄 중에 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: because of his sins that he committed
doing evil in the sight of the Lord
walking in the way of Jeroboam
and for his sin which he committed
